effect.name: Photoshop Dissolve (Texture)
effect.description: (The effect comes from Photoshop) Applies a random alpha color change to texture pixels. A random value is generated for each pixel, and if this value is below _Mixing, the pixel becomes fully transparent.
effect.author: Foxioo
